original: Lagerlöf, Nils Holger, apotekare, Marstrand, f. 6/8/07 i Kungälv av med. lic. Carl Danied L. o. Elin Röing. G. 35 m. farm. kand. Brita Thörn. Barn: Johan Daniel f. 37, d. 42, Elisabeth 42. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 25, farm. kand. 29, apot:ex. 33. Elev v. apot. Kronan i Gbg 26-28, anst. v. Svanen i Gbg, Hjorten i Gbg 29-31, Vasen i Gbg 33-46, priv. å apot. i Marstrand sed. 46.
translated: Lagerlöf, Nils Holger, pharmacist, Marstrand, born on August 6, 1907 in Kungälv, son of medical licentiate Carl Daniel L. and Elin Röing. Married in 1935 to pharmaceutical candidate Brita Thörn. Children: Johan Daniel born in 1937, died in 1942, Elisabeth born in 1942. Education: graduated from Gothenburg University in 1925, pharmaceutical candidate in 1929, pharmacy exam in 1933. Apprentice at Kronan pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1926-1928, employed at Svanen pharmacy in Gothenburg, Hjorten pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1929-1931, Vasen pharmacy in Gothenburg from 1933-1946. Private practice at a pharmacy in Marstrand since 1946.
